pages.text: The Thunderbrand is a legendary halberd that harnesses the power of thunder. The halberd is crafted from a rare metal that is able to conduct electricity with ease, while the handle is wrapped in a special insulating material that allows the wielder to hold the halberd safely.

The halberd's ability to dash forward with incredible speed, allows the wielder to close the distance and strike with deadly precision. The Thunderbrand is also able to release a powerful surge of electricity that can strike multiple enemies at once, making it a formidable weapon on the battlefield.
